data.decision: Decision Outcomes v1 architecture: de-dupe decisions_created + decisions_used, deltas (+0.005/+0.002/-0.01), threshold-based status (0.7 validated, 0.3 reversed), track last_evaluated_at separately from verified_at
data.rationale: Decisions are hypotheses that survive contact with reality. Reward successful reuse, punish failure-causing reuse, ignore everything else. Simpler than N-of-successes counting, avoids state sprawl.
data.context: Phase 1.2 hardening roadmap item. v1.1 will add staleness decay and weights.
